info.name: Pikachu Dashboard Buttons
info.description:
Dashboard button image from taffytard (http://userstyles.org/styles/41103/pikachu)
For my own use, but feel free to use it if you want to. 
Images are not mine, but I do take credit for editing out the text so it doesn't clash with the dashboard's original text. ^ ^
questions/comments/concerns @ shiroihime.tumblr.com/ask
